name: WHEN THEY GO LOW, I GET HIGH.
description: A play on the now famous one-liner that Former First Lady Michelle Obama confidently said at the DNC Convention on July 25th, 2016, "When they go low, we go high." Before we get to the main part of this conversation, During the early part of COVID19 pandemic, as we were all locked up for weeks on end in our homes, the news just got worse and worse. At some point you had to shut off the TV because of the absolute garbage that Trump & Co. were putting out made you either want to smoke, drink, and/or self-medicate. I elected for the latter of the three using copious amounts of cannabis edibles. There comes a threshold of mental pain, similar to hitting yourself with a wooden board repeatedly, that listening to Donald Trump had on me that catapulted me into self-medication. It gave me the freedom to process information the way MY mind works, not how FOX News works. So when they went low, (with telling lies, wantonly spreading misinformation for their political gains, needlessly endangering the lives of millions of Americans including their own constituents, etc) I got high as hell and it helped me immensely deal with reality.
